name: Locked Delusion
description:
Waking up in an unknown place, the protagonist finds himself trapped in a place full of puzzles, where he must solve them to advance while the place becomes more stranger.

Locked Delusion is a simple and short escape room where you have to solve puzzles to advance to the next room.

The game lasts approximately 60-70 minutes depending on how good you are at the puzzles, and there's a hints system if you need it
